title: Butterfingers
text: Drop your weapon.

title: Catch your breath
text: You can only take a move action next round.

title: Stuck
text: Your weapon is stuck in a nearby surface. DC 20 Str check to free it.

title: Backswing
text: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target.

title: Slipped
text: You are knocked %STATUS-PRONE=prone%.

title: This sword is too heavy
text: You are %STATUS-FATIGUED=fatigued%.

title: Awkward attack
text: You take -2 penalty to AC for 1d4 rounds.

title: Overextend
text: You provoke an attack of opportunity from all adjacent opponents.

title: Pulled muscle
text: You take 1d4 points of %ABILITY-STR=Str% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage%.

title: Fling
text: You drop your weapon and it lands 1d6 squares away in a random direction.

title: Broken blade
text: Your weapon is destroyed (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Ref negates%). %OBJECT-DAMAGE=Magic weapons use their own save bonus% (Dungeon Master's Guide 214).

title: Notched
text: Your weapon takes 1d6 %OBJECT-DAMAGE=points of damage%, ignoring hardness.

title: Parry! Dodge! Spin! Thrust!
text: You are %STATUS-DAZED=dazed% for 1 round.

title: Hand it over
text: Your target gains possession of your weapon (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Ref negates%).

title: Shield crash
text: Your attack deals %OBJECT-DAMAGE=damage to your shield%.

title: Winded
text: You are %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted% (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Fort negates%).

title: Wide open
text: You are %STATUS-FLAT-FOOTED=flat-footed% for 1 round.

title: Critical mistake
text: The attack hits you and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit.

title: Strain
text: You take 1d4 points of %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage%.

title: Too much stuff
text: You become %STATUS-ENTANGLED=entangled% in your gear until you spend a standard action to free yourself.

title: Spinning swing
text: You are %STATUS-SICKENED=sickened% for 1d4 rounds.

title: I told you it was sharp
text: You take 1d6 points of %STATUS-BLEED=bleed%.

title: Pin prick
text: You take 1 point of %STATUS-BLEED=bleed%.

title: Off balance
text: You take a -4 penalty on all attack rolls for 1 round.

title: Sorry
text: Your attack hits an ally adjacent to you or the target.

title: Bonk
text: You are %STATUS-STUNNED=stunned% for 1 round (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Fort negates%).

title: Catastrophic failure
text: You fall %STATUS-UNCONSCIOUS=unconscious% for 1d6 rounds (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Will negates%).

title: Pointy end goes there
text: You take 1 point of %ABILITY-CON=Con% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage%.

title: Broken haft
text: Your weapon loses reach. You have a -4 penalty on attack rolls with it until repaired (DC 20 Craft check).

title: Fog of war
text: You threaten no square for 1d6 rounds.

title: Go for the eyes
text: You are %STATUS-BLINDED=blinded% for 1 round.

title: Punt
text: Your weapon flies 2d6 squares in a random direction.

title: Bad grip
text: Your weapon deals %NONLETHAL-DAMAGE=nonlethal damage% for the next 3 rounds.

title: Who was that
text: You are %STATUS-DAZED=dazed% for 1d3 rounds.

title: You meant to do that
text: Move 10 feet in a random direction provoking attacks of opportunity as normal.

title: Eat dirt
text: You fall %STATUS-PRONE=prone% and are %STATUS-BLINDED=blinded% for 1d3 rounds (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Fort negates%).

title: Second thoughts
text: You are %STATUS-SICKENED=sickened% for 1d6 rounds.

title: Attack the darkness
text: All your enemies have concealment from you for 1d4 rounds.

title: Wait! What?
text: You are %STATUS-CONFUSED=confused% for 1 round.

title: Wrong end
text: If you're using a slashing weapon, you take 1d6 points of damage and 1 point of %STATUS-BLEED=bleed%.

title: Vibration
text: If you're using a bludgeoning weapon, you take 1d3 of %ABILITY-STR=Str% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage% and drop your weapon.

title: No way
text: Your attack hits the target, but deals minimum damage.

title: Funny bone
text: You drop whatever is in your off hand.

title: Bent
text: You take -4 penalty on all attacks with this weapon until it is repaired (DC 20 Craft Check).

title: All or nothing
text: You take a -1 penalty on attack rolls until you score a critical hit.

title: Surrounded by foes
text: Your attack hits an ally within reach and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit.

title: On the receiving end
text: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target.

title: Bohemian earspoon
text: You are %STATUS-DEAFENED=deafened% %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed% (DC 15 Heal Check).

title: Better to give
text: You attack damages you instead. Use your target's Str modifier.

title: Cutter
text: You take 1 point of %ABILITY-STR=Str% %STATUS-BLEED=bleed%.

title: This is bad
text: You take an amount of %STATUS-BLEED=bleed% equal to your Str bonus (minimum 1).

title: Armor smash
text: Your attack deals %OBJECT-DAMAGE=damage to your armor%.
